name: Egyptian Pyramid Solitaire - For VIP Poker Players
name_original: Egyptian Pyramid Solitaire - For VIP Poker Players
description:
*GET IT NOW WHILE ITS HOT! BEST SOLITAIRE GAME YET*

Discover the next evolution of solitaire in Egypt with amazing graphics and mechanic. This is a card game like one you have never experienced before.

So easy to use, built especially for your iPhone and iPad to bring you the best card game experience ever. Fall in love with the pyramid style of Solitaire all over again, and join millions of players to see where you rank.

FUN & EASY :)

Simply play off your hand. Go fast to earn more points. These high quality art make it impossible to squint.

With this solitaire game you get unlimited puzzle games.
